block.p: LEAD: International A3026 Soviet Jews are emigrating in record numbers, and Israel is bracing for its greatest explosion of immigration since its early days of independence. Page A1

Workers at the Nevada Test Site, the desert proving ground for American nuclear weapons, were repeatedly exposed to dangerous levels of radiation, according to Government records made public in a court case. A1

Two big American retail companies, subsidiaries of the Toronto-based Campeau empire, said they had to consider the possibility of going into bankruptcy. The companies operate Bloomingdale's and other well-known stores. A1
